mdRecord.dcterms:title: Giemsa's blood stain
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: The Coleman and Bell Company
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Brown glass bottle with metal black cap, containing powder residue. Label Information: 6565-153-9967 (handwritten); Lot No. C Ge-5; 1 gram; Giemsa's Blood Stain; lists instructions for use; The Coleman and Bell Co., Norwood Ohio., U.S.A; Stock No. JAN 1-214-500. Sticker on back: Found satisfactory by Biological Stain Commission for purposes mentioned on main label. This does not imply approval for any medicinal use.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Medical laboratory technology
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
